group_1.textRight: How do you even describe this…?
A little sister helps her big sister's dream@come true…

group_1.textLeft: You could say she…sacrificed herself,@pretty much.

group_1.textRight: How could you say something like that?!@Gunhild…she…

group_1.textLeft: Ain't no other way of puttin' it, considerin'@what happens to Magical Girls.

group_1.textRight: …Nngh…

group_1.textLeft: Well, if I might frame it in another way…
One could consider it "devotion," perhaps.

group_1.textRight: I dunno if I could jump straight into hard mode@like that all by myself.
She…really is an amazing little sister.

group_1.textLeft: …Well, in a way, yeah.

group_1.textRight: …Y-Yuna!

group_1.textLeft: What is it?

group_1.textRight: Could we maybe…help 'em with their dream?

group_1.textLeft: …Huh? What're you goin' on about?

group_1.textRight: I-I'm sure the goal of our collection@mission here…!
I think it's to help Olga achieve her dream!
Don'tcha think that's how it'll go?
If we help 'em with their goal,@it might also help us with ours…!

group_1.textLeft: …There's no point.

group_1.textRight: Wha…?

group_1.textLeft: Olga and Gunhild's dream is something@personal to them.
For us as outsiders, from an entirely different@era at that...
It's not our place or our right to get involved.
We know that full well…

group_1.textRight: Ugh…

group_1.textLeft: …Fine.
I…guess so…

group_1.textRight: …Well, in that case!
We gotta keep Kyubey away from Olga...
As soon as we find him,@we'll handle everything…!
I'm afraid I can't let you do that.
Doing so may indirectly interfere with history.

group_1.textLeft: Kyubey is Kyubey, ain't he?!
What's he got to do with history?!

group_1.textRight: Perhaps nothing.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Then why are you stoppin' us?

group_1.textRight: Because we don't know for certain if stopping@him will change history or not.
It's unwise to meddle with either possibility.

group_1.textLeft: In particular, those who bear the fate of Magical@Girls may be deeply entwined with history.

group_1.textRight: …That's my assumption, yes.
Nngh…urgh…
Yuna, you're so wise…@Can't you think of something?!

group_1.textLeft: Our purpose is not to communicate with@these two sisters…
We're here to retrieve Tamaki's concept.
If we can't manage that, there's no point@in anything else…
Horse...I think you might be gettin'@a little too attached.

group_1.textRight: But…I see where Hikaru is coming from, too…

group_1.textLeft: Well…I gotta admit the same…
As do I.

group_1.textRight: Yuna…

group_1.textLeft: It's not like I'm coldly looking down on them...
Being forced to witness the cruel fates@of those sisters…
…playing out right in front of us,@sisters ourselves…
